pros:
-Good benefits
-Baptist College of Health Sciences Alumni
-Possible student loan forgiveness
cons: I only worked at Baptist related facilities during clinical rotations.

pros: The small school atmosphere leads to great relationships with fellow students and faculty. All of the people here are dedicated to their field of study and their future careers.
cons: The nature of the students and the coursework is very dedicated, so many teachers will count attendance as part of the grade, which can be annoying, but gives incentive to not skip class.
